text:
Research and Markets: Global Mobile Security Market - The Market is set to Grow at a CAGR of 38.3%t Over the Period 2013-2018 October 14, 2015 08:18 AM Eastern Daylight Time 
DUBLIN--( BUSINESS WIRE )-- Research and Markets ( http://www.researchandmarkets.com/research/q6xljn/global_mobile ) has announced the addition of the "Global Mobile Security Market 2014-2018" report to their offering. 
Increased adoption of the Bring Your Own Device policy is one of the major trends driving the market. Most enterprises are adopting the BYOD concept. The implementation of the BYOD policy helps enterprises reduce expenditure on communication devices, thus reducing overall costs. 
According to the report, the growth of the Global Mobile Security market is predominantly driven by the high adoption of advanced mobile devices. This is increasing the demand for mobile security. The number of unit shipments of smartphones, tablets, and portable PCs have increased significantly, and this growth is expected to continue during the forecast period. The demand for mobile security has increased with growing adoption of advanced mobile devices. 
This report covers the present scenario and the growth prospects of the Global Mobile Security market for the period 2014-2018. To calculate the market size, the report considers the revenue generated from the sales of mobile security solutions.
